idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.4000

descript.abstract: Data Development:Combined all trail systems throughout Philadelphia via merging. Historical maps, existing park maps, FPC_Trails layers, and other existing trail layers were used to create the All Trails shape file.Several trails systems have been altered, updated, or removed.Updated with the FOW Trail layer 2013Key attribute field names and descriptions:Material: the trail system materialParkName: the name of the park in which the trail residesTrailType: type of trailCondition: trail conditionWidth: trail widthname: name of trail (limited field)Coordinate System:Lambert_Conformal_Conic, NAD83, PA South State Plane Coordinates, US FootThematic mapping:If name desired, use the name field, althought this field is limited with data.
descript.purpose: Major walking/biking/hiking/horse trails running through Philadelphia's Park and Recreation facilities. Features updated: 11/13/2013 Attributes updated: 11/13/2013 Metadata updated: 11/13/2013
descript.supplinf: The older versions of this file are in the Soft Delete folder as of 07/2010

dataqual.logic: Postition of trails has not been compared to new 2008 Orthos. Layer is used often, so there should be no major inacuracies.

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143
dataIdInfo.idPurp: Major walking/biking/hiking/horse trails running through Philadelphia's Park and Recreation facilities. Features updated: 11/13/2013 Attributes updated: 11/13/2013 Metadata updated: 03/31/2013
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Data Development:

  • Combined all trail systems throughout Philadelphia via merging.

  • Historical maps, existing park maps, FPC_Trails layers, and other existing trail layers were used to create the All Trails shape file.

  • Several trails systems have been altered, updated, or removed.

  • Updated with the FOW Trail layer 2013

Key attribute field names and descriptions:

  • Material: the trail system material

  • ParkName: the name of the park in which the trail resides

  • TrailType: type of trail

  • Condition: trail condition

  • Width: trail width

  • name: name of trail (limited field)

Coordinate System:

  • Lambert_Conformal_Conic, NAD83, PA South State Plane Coordinates, US Foot

Thematic mapping:

  • If name desired, use the name field, althought this field is limited with data.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Nora Dougherty, Geospatial Analyst Philadelphia Parks & Recreation 1515 Arch Street, 10th Floor Philadelphia, PA 19102

Consts.useLimit: The City of Philadelphia makes no representation about the accuracy of any specific information in this GIS data and is provided as is and without Warranty of any kind. The user of this data will assume complete responsibility for any and all occurrences resulting from its use or display and will hold the City of Philadelphia harmless from any and all claims, demands, liabilities, obligations, damages, suits, judgments or settlements, including reasonable costs and attorneys' fees, that arise from use of this data.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
